tooltip.hoverpets.one_pet: You may only have one pet at a time!
tooltip.hoverpets.no_permission: You don't have permission to use this pet!
tooltip.hoverpets.blaze_pet: Instantly extinguishes the player when on fire
tooltip.hoverpets.chicken_pet: Chance to pluck a random seed from the ground
tooltip.hoverpets.cow_pet: Clears negative status effects every minute
tooltip.hoverpets.pufferfish_pet: Poisons your attackers when you are below 3 hearts
tooltip.hoverpets.magma_cube_pet: Allows you to walk on lava
tooltip.hoverpets.creeper_pet: Creates an explosion where you die
tooltip.hoverpets.panda_pet: Randomly replenishes a portion of your hunger
tooltip.hoverpets.witch_pet: Splashes Villagers, Iron Golems, and Players with healing potions
tooltip.hoverpets.enderman_pet: Teleports you 10 blocks forward when pressing the Pet Key. Cooldown: 5s
